faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: A virtual number is a temporary phone number that can receive SMS verification without requiring a physical SIM card.
faq.q2: How long does the number stay active?
faq.a2: For activations, the number stays active for 20 minutes. For rentals, you choose the duration (1 day to 1 month).
faq.q3: Can I use the same number multiple times?
faq.a3: No, each activation uses a new unique number to guarantee privacy.
faq.q4: What happens if I don't receive the SMS?
faq.a4: If no SMS is received, your credit is automatically refunded to your account.
faq.q5: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a5: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum) and bank transfers.
faq.a6: Yes, our virtual numbers are 100% legal and compliant with international regulations.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.testimonial1: Amazing service! I received my WhatsApp code in less than 10 seconds. Very intuitive interface.
testimonials.testimonial2: Best prices on the market. I've been using One SMS for all my development projects for 2 years.
testimonials.testimonial3: Exceptional customer support. They solved my problem in 5 minutes. Really professional.

howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.subtitle: One SMS Platform
howToUse.description: Get virtual phone numbers for SMS verification in just a few simple steps. No SIM card required, instant delivery.
howToUse.stepsDescription: Follow these steps to receive your first verification code

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.description: Sign up for free with your email address or Google account. Verification is instant.
step1.tip1: Use a valid email to receive important notifications
step1.tip2: Google sign-in is the fastest option

step2.title: Add Credits
step2.description: Top up your account balance using various payment methods. Credits never expire.
step2.tip1: Start with a small amount to test the service

step3.title: Choose a Service
step3.description: Select the platform you need verification for: WhatsApp, Telegram, Instagram, and 500+ more.
step3.tip2: Use the search bar for quick access

step4.title: Select a Country
step4.description: Pick the country for your virtual number. Prices vary by country and availability.
step4.tip1: Countries with high success rates are highlighted
step4.tip2: Some services work better with specific countries

step5.title: Wait for SMS
step5.description: Once activated, wait for the verification SMS. Most arrive within 30 seconds.
step5.tip1: Keep the page open - codes appear automatically
step5.tip2: You have 20 minutes to receive the code

step6.title: Copy Your Code
step6.description: Click on the received code to copy it automatically. Paste it on the target platform.
step6.tip1: Codes are displayed clearly in blue boxes
step6.tip2: If no SMS arrives, you get an automatic refund

howToUse.featuresDescription: Built for speed, security, and reliability

security.title: 100% Secure
security.description: Your data is encrypted and never shared with third parties

speed.description: Receive SMS codes in under 30 seconds on average

refund.title: Auto Refund
refund.description: No SMS received? Your credits are automatically refunded

availability.title: 24/7 Available
availability.description: Service available round the clock, every day of the year

faq1.title: What payment methods are accepted?
faq1.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT) and bank transfers. All payments are secure and processed instantly.

faq2.title: What if I don't receive the SMS?
faq2.answer: If no verification code is received within the 20-minute window, your credits are automatically refunded to your account. No manual action required!

faq3.title: How long are numbers active?
faq3.answer: For one-time activations, numbers stay active for 20 minutes. For rentals, you choose the duration: 4 hours, 1 day, 1 week, or 1 month.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services
terms.contactUs: Our team is available to help you

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By accessing and using One SMS, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our service.

These terms constitute a legal agreement between you and One SMS. By creating an account or using our services, you confirm that:

  • You are at least 18 years old
  • You have the legal capacity to enter into contracts
  • You will use our services in accordance with applicable law

services.title: Service Description
services.content:
One SMS provides virtual phone numbers for receiving SMS verifications. Our services include:

  • One-time activation: Temporary numbers to receive a verification code (duration: 20 minutes)
  • Number rental: Extended access to a number for multiple verifications
  • International coverage: Numbers available in over 150 countries

Services are provided "as is" and we do not guarantee the availability of all numbers or services at all times.

registration.title: Registration and Account
registration.content:
To use our services, you must create an account by providing:

  • A valid email address
  • A secure password

Account responsibilities:

  • You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your credentials
  • You are responsible for all activities conducted through your account
  • You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access
  • Only one account per person is allowed

payment.title: Payment and Credits
payment.content:
Credit system:

  • Services are prepaid through our credit system
  • 1 credit = 100 FCFA (or equivalent in local currency)
  • Number prices vary by country and service
  • Credits are frozen when purchasing a number and debited upon SMS receipt

Accepted payment methods:

  • Bank cards (Visa, Mastercard)
  • Mobile Money (Orange Money, Wave, etc.)
  • Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, USDT)

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.content:
Automatic refunds:

  • If no SMS is received within 20 minutes, credits are automatically refunded
  • You can cancel an order before receiving the SMS

Non-refundable cases:

  • SMS received and used
  • Account banned by target service (user responsibility)
  • Incorrect API usage
  • Abuse of the refund system

Balance refund: Upon request, we can refund your balance (minus transaction fees) within 30 business days.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibited.content:
It is strictly forbidden to use our services for:

  • Any illegal or fraudulent activity
  • Creating accounts for malicious activities
  • Spam, phishing, or scams
  • Violating third-party terms of service
  • Identity theft
  • Money laundering
  • Any activity that infringes on others' rights

Consequences: Any violation will result in immediate account suspension without refund.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content:
One SMS cannot be held liable for:

  • Temporary service unavailability
  • Account bans by third-party services
  • Indirect losses related to the use of our services
  • Actions taken by third parties using your credentials
  • Interruptions due to maintenance or updates

Our maximum liability is limited to the amount of credits in your account at the time of the incident.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content:
By user:

  • You can close your account at any time from settings
  • Remaining credits can be refunded upon request

By One SMS:

  • We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account for terms violations
  • Accounts inactive for more than one year may be deleted
  • In case of proven fraud, the account will be banned without refund

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content:
We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes take effect upon publication on the website.

In case of major changes, we will notify you by email. Your continued use of services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

We recommend checking this page regularly to stay informed of any updates.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
For any questions regarding these Terms of Service, contact us:

  • Email: support@onesms.app
  • Contact page: Contact form

We strive to respond to all inquiries within 48 business hours.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we protect and use your personal data
privacy.contactUs: Contact our team for any privacy-related inquiries

rights.access: Right to access your personal data
rights.deletion: Right to request deletion of your data

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content:
At One SMS, we place paramount importance on protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information.

This policy complies with the European Union's General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable data protection laws.

By using our services, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content:
Data we collect:

  • Account information: Email, password (encrypted)
  • Transaction data: Purchase history, payment methods used
  • Technical data: IP address, browser type, operating system
  • Usage data: Pages visited, actions taken, timestamps

Data we do NOT collect:

  • Biometric data
  • Health data
  • Political or religious opinions
  • SMS content (we do not store verification codes)

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content:
We use your personal data for:

  • Service provision: Create and manage your account, process transactions
  • Communication: Send important notifications, respond to your requests
  • Improvement: Analyze usage to improve our services
  • Security: Detect and prevent fraud, protect our systems
  • Legal compliance: Meet our legal and regulatory obligations

We never sell your personal data to third parties.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content:
We implement robust security measures to protect your data:

  • Encryption: All data is encrypted in transit (TLS) and at rest
  • Passwords: Stored with secure hashing (bcrypt)
  • Limited access: Only authorized personnel can access data
  • Monitoring: Real-time intrusion detection systems
  • Backups: Regular and secure backups

Despite our efforts, no system is infallible. In case of a data breach, we will notify you in accordance with the law.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content:
We only share your data with:

  • Payment providers: To process your transactions (Moneroo, PayTech, Wave, Orange Money)
  • Hosting services: To store and secure your data (Supabase)
  • Legal authorities: Only upon valid legal request

We never share:

  • Your data with advertisers
  • Your information with data brokers
  • Your usage history with commercial third parties

cookies.title: Cookies and Technologies
cookies.content:
We use cookies and similar technologies for:

  • Essential cookies: Necessary for site operation (session, authentication)
  • Preference cookies: Remember your choices (language, theme)
  • Analytics cookies: Understand how you use our service

Cookie management:

You can configure your browser to refuse cookies. Note that some features may not work properly without cookies.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content:
Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

  • Right of access: Obtain a copy of your personal data
  • Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate data
  • Right to erasure: Request deletion of your data
  • Right to portability: Receive your data in a structured format
  • Right to object: Object to certain processing
  • Right to withdraw: Withdraw your consent at any time

To exercise these rights, contact us at support@onesms.app

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content:
Retention periods:

  • Account data: Retained as long as account is active
  • Transaction data: 5 years (accounting obligations)
  • Connection data: 12 months
  • Cookies: Depending on type (session to 2 years maximum)

After account closure:

Your data is deleted within 30 days, unless legally required to retain.

international.title: International Transfers
international.content:
Your data may be processed in countries outside your country of residence.

Safeguards in place:

  • Use of GDPR-compliant providers
  • EU Standard Contractual Clauses
  • Data protection certifications

We ensure that any international transfer complies with applicable data protection standards.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
For any privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights:

  • Email: privacy@onesms.app
  • Support: support@onesms.app
  • Form: Contact page

We respond to all requests within 30 days.

If you believe your rights are not being respected, you can file a complaint with your country's data protection authority.
